SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into video_list (name, cover_url, status, gmt_create, gmt_update) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update video_list set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, cover_url, status, gmt_create, gmt_update from video_list
